attributes.action: Do not legalise smoking on public transport
attributes.background: As we all know all different kinds of people take public transport perants with toddlers, mothers with prams, school pupils, college pupils, pregnant women and the Ederly all these types of people can be badly harmed by second hand smoke and it could ruin there lives in so many different ways

rejection.details: Smoking is not allowed on public transport. We are not aware of any plans to change this, so we are not sure what your petition is asking for.
